author: brianf
msg: move the attach descriptor to the maven pom since there's no site with the asf pom. Also set the inherited flag to false so it's not run for every child of maven.

author: johnh
msg: Allows to export the symbols for compiled JavaScript code in the way
that fits each JsCompiler best. Included is a default implementation in
AbstractJsCompiler that should fit most compilers most of the time.

author: brianf
msg: allow the plgMgt to be inherited for site, bump the reporting version.
